parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

*   Page starts from page 1.
*   Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

*   Maximum value: 50.
*   Default value: 10.

parameters.name: TargetId
parameters.description: The ID of the gateway or express synchronization group.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The task ID. If you leave the parameter empty, all tasks are queried.
